author: @BiancaAguglia
text: One thing that helps with the sedentary part of the data science job (or any computer heavy job) is a treadmill desk. You don't need anything fancy: just a cheap treadmill, a shelf from a hardware store or an old bookcase, a couple of bungee cords, and voila: a home-made treadmill desk. ğŸ˜
